data.title: Pierre le magnifique by Roger Lemelin
data.meta_description: Montreal: CLF Poche Canadien - Le Cercle du Livre de France Ltee 1st Page of Front Matter Missing; Light Creasing on Front, Rear Covers, Spine; Front, Rear Covers, Spine Lightly Chipped; Spine Slightly Cocked; Edges Lightly Soiled; Heavy Yellowing Due…
data.text:
Mary Shelley - Mother of Science Fiction

“I have love in me the likes of which you can scarcely imagine and rage the likes of which you would not believe. If I cannot satisfy the one, I will indulge the other.” - Learn more about Mary Shelley, the author of Frankenstein

The Importance of Dust Jackets

Is the dust jacket of a book worth holding on to? Consider its form, its function, and its beauty. Learn more about dust jackets and their importance to your collection.
